description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Ocean Trout with Wasabi Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chargrilled Ocean Trout with Wasabi Mayonnaise
name: Chargrilled Ocean Trout with Wasabi Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan or chargrill over medium-high heat. Drain marinade from fish and discard. Cook fish for 2-3 minutes each side, depending on thickness of the fish. Serve fish with salad and top with a dollop of wasabi mayonnaise.
